survey_name: Co-Working Space Amenities and Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of co-working spaces about their satisfaction with amenities, services, and overall experience to help improve future offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to accurately gauge usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with vertical layout for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice options allow for understanding which amenities are most valued.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an 'Other' option for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback on satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with a neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: What additional services or amenities would you like to see offered in your co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback for future improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What additional services or amenities would you like to see offered in your co-working space?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge overall satisfaction and loyalty.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons for easy response capture.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to others?
